channel.title: Lynda Carter on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Lynda Carter on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Hollywood Flashback: ‘Battle of the Network Stars’ Turned Celebs Into Gladiators
item.description: The ABC show pitted actors from the big three networks against one another, with Howard Cosell presiding over the spectacle.

item.title: Hollywood Flashback: ‘Battle of the Network Stars’ Turned Celebs Into Gladiators
item.description: The ABC show pitted actors from the big three networks against one another, with Howard Cosell presiding over the spectacle.

item.title: Loni Anderson, ‘WKRP in Cincinnati’ Star, Dies at 79
item.description: She received two Emmy noms for being “the smartest person in the room” on the CBS sitcom and tons of tabloid attention for her 1988-94 marriage to Burt Reynolds.

item.title: Loni Anderson, ‘WKRP in Cincinnati’ Star, Dies at 79
item.description: She received two Emmy noms for being “the smartest person in the room” on the CBS sitcom and tons of tabloid attention for her 1988-94 marriage to Burt Reynolds.
